verses.verse: Then answered <S%H6030><s%> Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> the Temanite, <S%H8489><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
Should a wise <S%H2450><s%> man utter <S%H6030><s%> vain <S%H7307><s%> knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> and fill <S%H4390><s%> his belly <S%H990><s%> with the east <S%H6921><s%> wind? <S%H7307><s%>
Should he reason <S%H3198><s%> with unprofitable <S%H5532><s%> talk? <S%H1697><s%> or with speeches <S%H4405><s%> with which he can do <S%H5953><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> good? <S%H3276><s%>
Yes, <S%H637><s%> you cast <S%H6565><s%> off fear, <S%H3374><s%> and restrain <S%H1639><s%> prayer <S%H7878><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God. <S%H410><s%>
For your mouth <S%H6310><s%> utters <S%H502><s%> your iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and you choose <S%H977><s%> the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the crafty. <S%H6175><s%>
Your own mouth <S%H6310><s%> comdemns <S%H7561><s%> you, and not I: yes, your own lips <S%H8193><s%> testify <S%H6030><s%> against you.
Are you the first <S%H7223><s%> man <S%H120><s%> that was born? <S%H3205><s%> or were you made <S%H2342><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the hills? <S%H1389><s%>
Have you heard <S%H8085><s%> the secret <S%H5475><s%> of God? <S%H433><s%> and do you restrain <S%H1639><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> to yourself? <S%H413><s%>
What <S%H4100><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> you, that we know <S%H3045><s%> not? what understand <S%H995><s%> you, which <S%H1931><s%> is not in us?
With us are both <S%H1571><s%> the gray headed <S%H7867><s%> and very <S%H3453><s%> aged <S%H3453><s%> men, much <S%H3524><s%> elder <S%H1419><s%> than your father. <S%H1><s%>
Are the consolations <S%H8575><s%> of God <S%H410><s%> small <S%H4592><s%> with you? is there any secret <S%H328><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> with you?
Why <S%H4100><s%> does your heart <S%H3820><s%> carry <S%H3947><s%> you away? and what <S%H4100><s%> do your eyes <S%H5869><s%> wink <S%H7335><s%> at,
That you turn <S%H7725><s%> your spirit <S%H7307><s%> against <S%H413><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> and let such words <S%H4405><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> out of your mouth? <S%H6310><s%>
What <S%H4100><s%> is man, <S%H582><s%> that he should be clean? <S%H2135><s%> and he which is born <S%H3205><s%> of a woman, <S%H802><s%> that he should be righteous? <S%H6663><s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> he puts no <S%H3808><s%> trust <S%H539><s%> in his saints; <S%H6918><s%> yes, the heavens <S%H8064><s%> are not clean <S%H2141><s%> in his sight. <S%H5869><s%>
How <S%H637><s%> much more abominable <S%H8581><s%> and filthy <S%H444><s%> is man, <S%H376><s%> which drinks <S%H8354><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%> like water? <S%H4325><s%>
I will show <S%H2331><s%> you, hear <S%H8085><s%> me; and that which I have seen <S%H2372><s%> I will declare; <S%H5608><s%>
Which <S%H834><s%> wise <S%H2450><s%> men have told <S%H5046><s%> from their fathers, <S%H1><s%> and have not hid <S%H3582><s%> it:
To whom <S%H1992><s%> alone <S%H905><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> was given, <S%H5414><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> stranger <S%H2114><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

The wicked <S%H7563><s%> man travails <S%H2342><s%> with pain all <S%H3605><s%> his days, <S%H3117><s%> and the number <S%H4557><s%> of years <S%H8141><s%> is hidden <S%H6845><s%> to the oppressor. <S%H6184><s%>
A dreadful <S%H6343><s%> sound <S%H6963><s%> is in his ears: <S%H241><s%> in prosperity <S%H7965><s%> the destroyer <S%H7703><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on him.
He believes <S%H539><s%> not that he shall return <S%H7725><s%> out of darkness, <S%H2822><s%> and he is waited <S%H6822><s%> for of the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

He wanders <S%H5074><s%> abroad <S%H5074><s%> for bread, <S%H3899><s%> saying, Where <S%H346><s%> is it? he knows <S%H3045><s%> that the day <S%H3117><s%> of darkness <S%H2822><s%> is ready <S%H3559><s%> at his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Trouble <S%H6862><s%> and anguish <S%H4691><s%> shall make him afraid; <S%H1204><s%> they shall prevail <S%H8630><s%> against him, as a king <S%H4428><s%> ready <S%H6264><s%> to the battle. <S%H3593><s%>
For he stretches <S%H5186><s%> out his hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H413><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> and strengthens <S%H1396><s%> himself against <S%H413><s%> the Almighty. <S%H7706><s%>
He runs <S%H7323><s%> on him, even on his neck, <S%H6677><s%> on the thick <S%H5672><s%> bosses <S%H1354><s%> of his bucklers: <S%H4043><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> he covers <S%H3680><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> with his fatness, <S%H2459><s%> and makes <S%H6213><s%> bulges <S%H6371><s%> of fat <S%H6371><s%> on his flanks. <S%H3689><s%>

And he dwells <S%H7931><s%> in desolate <S%H3582><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and in houses <S%H1004><s%> which no <S%H3808><s%> man inhabits, <S%H3427><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are ready <S%H6257><s%> to become heaps. <S%H1530><s%>

He shall not be rich, <S%H6238><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall his substance <S%H2428><s%> continue, <S%H6965><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall he prolong <S%H5186><s%> the perfection <S%H4512><s%> thereof on the earth. <S%H776><s%>

He shall not depart <S%H5493><s%> out of darkness; <S%H2822><s%> the flame <S%H7957><s%> shall dry <S%H3001><s%> up his branches, <S%H3127><s%> and by the breath <S%H7307><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall he go <S%H5493><s%> away.
Let not him that is deceived <S%H8582><s%> trust <S%H539><s%> in vanity: <S%H7723><s%> for vanity <S%H7723><s%> shall be his recompense. <S%H8545><s%>
It shall be accomplished <S%H4390><s%> before <S%H3808><s%> his time, <S%H3117><s%> and his branch <S%H3712><s%> shall not be green. <S%H7488><s%>
He shall shake <S%H2554><s%> off his unripe <S%H1154><s%> grape <S%H1154><s%> as the vine, <S%H1612><s%> and shall cast <S%H7993><s%> off his flower <S%H5328><s%> as the olive. <S%H2132><s%>
For the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of hypocrites <S%H2611><s%> shall be desolate, <S%H1565><s%> and fire <S%H784><s%> shall consume <S%H398><s%> the tabernacles <S%H168><s%> of bribery. <S%H7810><s%>
They conceive <S%H2029><s%> mischief, <S%H5999><s%> and bring <S%H3205><s%> forth <S%H3205><s%> vanity, <S%H205><s%> and their belly <S%H990><s%> prepares <S%H3559><s%> deceit. <S%H4820><s%>
